title: Hard Up, Ardon #3
description: With Malcolm holidaying with Sally over in Hong Kong, Dexter finds himself alone with new friend Mike Hunt and a possible new job with the local fire brigade.  Will the wannabe gangster become a full-time fireman? Will he ever forgive Mike and his wife for their little affair? And more importantly, why do they all end up sharing newlyweds(The Ardon's) honeymoon?
author: Jimmy Perrin
